original_solution_mapping.L1: In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=130>>130 trophies.
original_solution_mapping.L2: If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=300>>300 in three years.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 300+130 = <<300+130=430>>430 handball trophies in three years.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1171.
    Returns: the total number of trophies Jack and Michael will have altogether after three years.
    """
    # L1
    michael_trophies_now = 30 # Michael has 30 trophies right now
    michael_increase_in_three_years = 100 # number of his trophies increases by 100 in three years
    michael_trophies_after_three_years = michael_trophies_now + michael_increase_in_three_years

    # L2
    jack_multiplier = 10 # ten times more handball trophies
    jack_trophies_after_three_years = jack_multiplier * michael_trophies_now

    # L3
    total_trophies = jack_trophies_after_three_years + michael_trophies_after_three_years

    # FA
    answer = total_trophies
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In three years, Michael will have {michael_trophies_now}+{michael_increase_in_three_years} = <<{michael_trophies_now}+{michael_increase_in_three_years}={michael_trophies_after_three_years}>>{michael_trophies_after_three_years} trophies.

If Michael has {michael_trophies_now} trophies now, Jack will have {jack_multiplier}*{michael_trophies_now} = <<{michael_trophies_now}*{jack_multiplier}={jack_trophies_after_three_years}>>{jack_trophies_after_three_years} in three years.

Altogether, Jack and Michael will have {jack_trophies_after_three_years}+{michael_trophies_after_three_years} = <<{jack_trophies_after_three_years}+{michael_trophies_after_three_years}={total_trophies}>>{total_trophies} handball trophies in three years.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=130>>130 trophies.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=300>>300 in three years.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 300+10 = <<300+10=310>>310 handball trophies in three years.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'jack_multiplier' (value: 10) was used instead of 'michael_trophies_after_three_years' (value: 130).
